product_name: NeutrogenaHydro Boost Water Gel, Refillable Jar + Refill Pod
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDeliver a refreshing burst of hydration for glowing skin. Designed for normal, dry, and acne-prone skin, this water gel facial moisturizer + refill set delivers 6x more hydration (vs. untreated skin).
details: DetailsBenefitsWeightless water gel gives a refreshing burst of hydration to normal, dry, & acne-prone skin.Refreshing formula provides clinically proven 48-hour hydration to soothe and nourish dry skin.Gentle facial moisturizer delivers 6x more hydration (vs. untreated skin) for quenched, dewy skin.Daily face gel instantly cools & refreshes skin, leaving it looking healthier after 2 weeks.Key IngredientsFormulated with hyaluronic acid, and Natural Moisturizing Factors to restore skin's moisture balance.Formulated WithoutParabenPhthalateItem 2620419How To UseApply evenly to face and neck daily after cleansing.Refill instructions: Twist the original blue pod in your jar counter-clockwise about a quarter turn, lift the pod out and follow recycling instructions below. Jar can be refilled and is compatible with Hydro Boost Water Gel refill pods only.Precautions: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Serine, Glycine, Alanine, Threonine, Arginine, Proline, Lysine HCl, Glutamic Acid, Sodium PCA, PCA, Sodium Lactate, Urea, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Betaine, Allantoin, Fructose, Maltose, Trehalose, Glucose, Pentylene Glycol, Synthetic Beeswax, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance, Blue 1.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to face and neck daily after cleansing.Refill instructions: Twist the original blue pod in your jar counter-clockwise about a quarter turn, lift the pod out and follow recycling instructions below. Jar can be refilled and is compatible with Hydro Boost Water Gel refill pods only.Precautions: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Where are just the refills?
reviews.comments: I previously purchased a jar and have been looking everywhere just for the refills. I was hoping this was another full jar plus a refill even though that's still not what I want. The product itself works amazingly on my oily skin under my makeup. However, it's a bit frustrating to purchase something that is refillable but then you can't buy *just* the refills.

reviews.headline: Highly satisfied
reviews.comments:
I have tried several other products over the years but tried this after it was recommended. I have dry, sensitive skin prone to patches of flaking even after moisturing, or redness if irritated.

I was very surprised to find this product moisturized skin throughout the day with no flaking or irritation.Its fantastic!

reviews.headline: Cannot find Refill Pod
reviews.comments: I like this product and REALLY APPRECIATE that Neutrogena is offering it as refillable to reduce waste! I cant find the stand-alone Refill Pod anywhere on Ulta's website. Please fix this! This defeats the purpose of refillable products.

reviews.headline: stay away If you have sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: This product has totally ruined my skin, it's dry, red, breaking out. It's awful ðŸ˜–

reviews.headline: Has been consistently a good moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have been using this moisturizer for over a year and I continue to buy it because I have found it more effective than other brands. It's lightweight, quick absorbency and moisturizes well leaving skin dewy and soft

reviews.headline: Why don't they have a fragrance free option?
reviews.comments: I love the refill pod idea as I feel like I'm not wasting such a big, bulky jar each time. But why don't they make these refill pods in a fragrance free version? The smell is kind of overpowering and it's unfortunate I may go back to the regular jars just to get a fragrance free option.

reviews.headline: I buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: I've tried many different moisturizers but always end up buying this moisturizer. I like the water cream version more for winter months and the water gel version during warmer months when my skin doesn't need as much moisture.

reviews.headline: I definitly will continue to use this product
reviews.comments: I love the feel of my skin after using the Hydro Boost moisturizer and also like the sun screen.  Refreshing and feels light, no oily residue.

faceoff_positive.comments: I absolutely love Neutrogena's Hydro Boost Water Gel! My face always gets super dry and flaky in the winter months, due to the cold and winds. I've tried everything from lotion, to other moisturizers, to vitamin E and more - nothing seemed to work. But after trying this for a week - I've noticed big changes! Upon opening, I first noticed the beautiful blue glass jar, not too heavy or difficult to open. The scent is pleasant and kind of floral, and it is light and airy. The texture of the gel isn't gel-like - it's more of a watery lotion - but you'll only need a dab or two to spread onto your face. It blends into your face like water, so a little dab goes a long way! It leaves no residue, no oily or greasy film - just feels like water on your face. After I've been using this for over a week and a half, I've noticed a big change on the skin of my face - less dryness, less flaking, and my skin feels soft and supple - better than it has in years! I truly think this is my new favorite!
faceoff_positive.headline: Hydro Boost Much Needed and Works!

faceoff_negative.comments: Overall, I thought that the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel and the Refill pod starter kit has definite potential but has a few characteristics that I would change and did not like. My overall perception of this product was a mixed 50/50. The product itself was great and felt great on my skin. It wasn't greasy what so ever and it didn't pill when I wore it under primer and make up. I didn't have to use much either. I can probably get at least 60 days of use before I would have to replace it. The one thing that I absolutely can not get over however is the smell of the moisturizer. It's strong and to me it smells like sunscreen that has gone past recommended shelf life. I don't think it's refreshing what so ever. I'm not normally sensitive to scent but I just can't get over it. The packaging was ok- if I could change one thing I would make the jar a little more heavy, perhaps make it out of glass instead of cheap plastic. The over all anesthetic is really pleasing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Has potential to be a great product!

rollup.name: Hydro Boost Water Gel, Refillable Jar + Refill Pod
